name: notself
text: Screw YOU, Mr. Bear

name: johnnyc
text: FUCK you!

name: johnnyc
text: this is a reference to another strip i have nothing against notself i am sorry for being so hurtful oh jesus

name: heccibiggs
text: I've started saying "Screw you, _______! FUCK you!" to like everything ever. i.e. This morning, it was to my hangover.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: one slo-mo bird, coming up!

name: stuart
text: (i've been on a roll lately)

name: mattylite
text: Beautiful!  I was gonna post that someone who knows how to do this sort of thing ought to make an animated gif of the last three panels.  The only thing better would be if the bird rose interminably slowly to the music that opens that long panning shot of the imperial cruiser at the beginning of Empire Strikes Back.

name: snowman
text: This comment, even with 57 chubbies, is underrated.

name: biiaru
text:
Can you make it go up, stay there for about 3 seconds, and then go back down again?

You know, just for the OCDs (like me) who would rather have it loop perfectly.

name: stuart
text: I did it with the gun but i eschewed it here because it didn't make any sense for lyle to be bobbing the bird in mr. bear's face

name: jollysaintpete
text: i think you were correct in this assumption

name: mr_pete
text: Lyle is being rude but Mr. Bear is being pompous. There are no winners.

name: kledermans
text: Pompous?  Hell, he's just stating the facts and his opinion.  He can't help it if he happens to be better than Lyle.

name: ghotifish
text: this is a lie. we are the winners.

name: lux
text: hee, I love your name. Are you also a linguistics student? Ghoti is the best way to spell fish.

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, tttt2, Slab64)

name: catachresis
text: You are a hero. And also a complete and utter loser. You are Schrodinger's personality assessment.

name: alejandroadam
text: you just sneek it up. from below the line of sight real slow. in complete silence. works every time.

name: juancarlos
text:
deimosrising...

....

.......

...........

Up yours deimosrising.

name: imitationcrab
text: music for the last 3 panels: "Also Sprach Zarathustra"

name: equinn2006
text: Yes! Yes, a thousand times yes.

name: tttt
text:
I wish I could chubby twice

thrice, even

name: luckypyjamas
text: amen

name: troy_convers
text: Or the start of Carmina Burama.

name: invidious
text: You mean "O Fortuna"?  Nah.  Imitationcrab hit it out of the park on the first pitch.

name: delzhand
text: I've seen someone take the last three panels, and animate it as their avatar.  Gets me every time!

name: chaesar
text: The 'Lyle/Cornelius' rift is mostly a class struggle. It's more socio-economic than cultural.

name: dougthehead
text: We don't get enough Lyle v. Cornelius.  I don't know if we can.

name: deancain29
text: classic Lyle.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: lol c~bear is sitting on a doily-chair

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: And Lyle is moving through the room, agitated by drink.

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
to this day my wife and i give each other the slo-mo finger.

which must always begin out of sight, only to rise from behind a table, pillow, or nearby cat.

name: tekende
text: Or, if necessary, the bottom line of the panel.

name: troy_convers
text: Chubbied for breaking INTO the forth wall.

name: smilebuddha
text: The Sally Forth wall?

name: red_dawn
text: Why do I laugh at this every time? Why?

name: killerlimpet
text:
I used to think like Mr. Bear.

And then I actually *read* some peoples' livejournals and xangas.

ouch.

name: gussiejives
text: Best comedic timing ever!

name: songbirdspectre
text: From the beginning of the 6th panel to the end of the 8th, I just said "Yesssssssss!"

name: tragicone
text: Lyle straight don't care about no one!

name: feetnotes
text: Oh God. Panel 7.

name: dipstikk
text: Chubbied for having a birdlike deinonychus avatar.

name: johnmatrix
text:
Is he raising his finger up really slow or are we seeing it in slow motion?

Regardless, it's funny. Try picturing it with that old fashioned low "rrrrrrr" sound that happens on cartoons when something is being slowly raised up.

name: qeramah
text: haha yeah, lyle probably has hell of hydraulics in his flippin' arm.

name: dasuta
text: OH THE INTENSITY!

name: nyu
text: If Lyle has 4 fingers, which one is the middle?

name: redmange
text: Well, the thumb isn't exactly a finger, so I guess he would go by the idea of the finger between his pinky and index being his -birdy-.

name: wonelove
text:
Hahahaha.
I love how Lyle slowly brings it up.

a big "up yours" rising from the bottom of the strip, right into Cornelius' face.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Once again Lyle reveals a little more info than his otherwise scattered blogs would have you believe he would be able to retain.

i.e. "Do your server logs..."

I'm building a thesis on this... ok, not really.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I don't know what it is, but the finger always makes me jam the five button.

name: dipstikk
text: Lyle's first appearance with a design update?
